Host AP driver / wpa_supplicant / hostapd releases


  • green background = stable release
  • white background = development release
  • letters after the version (what was included in the release):
    • d = Host AP driver
    • u = Host AP driver utilities
    • h = hostapd
    • w = wpa_supplicant
